comments.raw_text:
Option to force reminder for imported (CalDAV) events even though server side does not have reminders set for the event. 

For example, eGroupWare doesn't allow reminders set by default for all new calendar events. So events synchonize from eGroupWare -> TB Lightning but lack the reminder.

Maybe a option which forces reminders for these kinds of events could be implemented?
comments.author: hannu@mediamaisteri.com
comments.text:
Option to force reminder for imported (CalDAV) events even though server side does not have reminders set for the event. 

For example, eGroupWare doesn't allow reminders set by default for all new calendar events. So events synchonize from eGroupWare -> TB Lightning but lack the reminder.

Maybe a option which forces reminders for these kinds of events could be implemented?
